text: Jisas takaw olap agak, God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab ak, kesɨm debin awl tek gɨnɨgab agak. Tap teplep olap mani awl yɨbɨl ak tawɨl, dam wog nab okok dɨ we gɨnɨgabal agak. Bɨ olap tap teplep anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, tap ogɨnap dɨl pal tɨbɨk tep gɨl amnɨgab agak. Amɨl, mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg tap ne okok mɨdupsek dam binɨb okok kɨlop ñɨl mani dɨnɨgab agak. Dɨl, mani anɨb ak dad amɨl wog day anɨb ak tawɨl, am tap teplep we gup anɨb ak dɨnɨgab agak.
